content:
Distributed Authoring History (cont’d)

Distributed Authoring History (cont’d)

  • 1992: PUT disappears from HTTP specification, due to lack of support.
  • 1994: NaviPress/NaviServer developed
  • 1994(?): Vermeer FrontPage developed
  • 1994/1995?: W3C Line Mode Browser
  • Dec '94: WWW4 breakout session on distributed authoring tools
    • http://www.w3.org/pub/WWW/Collaboration/9512www4/auth-tools
